education.title: ShARE - Growing a new generation of leaders
education.degree: ShARE's Leadership programme of Excellence- Business and Consulting Services
education.description: ShARE is an innovative start-up at the crossroad of education and consulting. The ShARE Leadership Programme of Excellence is offered to students who have the potential to shape a more sustainable and inclusive world. The program helps students develop leadership and corporate skills, learn how to work across borders, collaborate on solving major societal issues and grow into Do Well Do Good leaders.
